name: The Quest for Achievements
description: The Quest for Achievements is a pixel mini RPG which will feature over 1000 steam achievements to Find - when you "find" them in game, You will be rewarded with a real life achievement! - COOL RIGHT?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 or radeon equivalent Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or radeon equivalent Storage: 500 MB available space
